UPDATE XR_PROCESS
NAME = #{name},
STATUS = #{status},
EXPECT_DATE = #{expect_dateDB},
COMPLETE_DATE = #{complete_dateDB},
CONTENT = #{content},
WHERE PROCESS_ID = #{process_id}

UPDATE XR_PROCESS_EXECUTOR
SORT_INDEX = #{sort_index},
STATUS = #{status},
START_DATE = #{start_dateDB},
END_DATE = #{end_dateDB},
TYPE IN ('R', 'C')
TYPE = 'A' AND STATUS = 'S'
TYPE = 'A'
AND EXECUTE_ID = #{execute_id}
AND PROCESS_ID = #{process_id}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.PROCESS_ID) FROM XR_PROCESS P INNER JOIN XR_PROCESS_EXECUTOR PE ON PE.EXECUTOR_ID = #{user_id} AND PE.PROCESS_ID = P.PROCESS_ID
AND (PE.TYPE = 'R' OR PE.TYPE = 'C') AND PE.STATUS = 'S' AND PE.TYPE = 'A' AND PE.STATUS = 'S' AND PE.TYPE = 'Q' AND (PE.TYPE = 'R' OR PE.TYPE = 'C') AND PE.STATUS = 'E' AND PE.TYPE = 'A' AND PE.STATUS = 'E' AND PE.TYPE = 'I' AND PE.STATUS = 'E' AND (PE.TYPE = 'R' OR PE.TYPE = 'C') AND PE.STATUS = 'S'
P.STATUS != 'E' P.STATUS IN ('W', 'M') P.STATUS = 'A' P.STATUS = 'M' P.STATUS = 'E'
AND ${strIndexColumn} LIKE '%${strKeyword1}%' AND P.CREATE_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{sdate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND P.CREATE_DATE < TO_DATE(#{edate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999

SELECT EXECUTE_ID, PROCESS_ID, TYPE, EXECUTOR_ID, EXECUTOR_NAME, STATUS, SORT_INDEX FROM XR_PROCESS_EXECUTOR WHERE
PROCESS_ID IN
#{item}
PROCESS_ID = #{process_id}
AND TYPE IN('Q','C','A','I')
AND TYPE IN('R','C','A','I')
ORDER BY SORT_INDEX

SELECT P.PROCESS_ID, P.NAME, R.IDX AS RECENTLY_ID FROM XR_PROCESS P INNER JOIN XR_RECENTLY_OBJECT R ON R.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND R.TARGET_TYPE = 'P' WHERE P.PROCESS_ID = R.TARGET_ID ORDER BY R.LAST_USED_DATE DESC

SELECT EXECUTE_ID, PROCESS_ID, DOC_ROOT_ID, TYPE, EXECUTOR_ID, EXECUTOR_NAME, SORT_INDEX, STATUS, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM XR_PROCESS_EXECUTOR WHERE PROCESS_ID = #{process_id} AND TYPE = 'A' AND STATUS != 'E' AND SORT_INDEX = ( SELECT MIN(sort_index) FROM XR_PROCESS_EXECUTOR WHERE PROCESS_ID = #{process_id} AND TYPE = 'A' AND STATUS != 'E' )
